title: Retirement income perils
creator_credit: Sally Wiadrowski and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: In this “4 Corners” special, reporter Chris Masters investigates an area which is causing plenty of grey hairs - Retirement Investment Planning - RIP. This is an overview of the efficacy of superannuation savings and how it will or will not allow people to live comfortably after retirement.
